name: Purgatorio -Prelude
description:
The Dantes believe the world is impure. By the order of their Master, they are sent to purge sinners from the world, with hopes of having a clean existence once again.

Controls:

  • Keyboard + Mouse
    • WASD - Movement
    • Space - Jump
    • Mouse - Aiming
    • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
    • R - Restart Game
  • Gamepad
    • Left Stick - Movement
    • A / Bottom Face Button - Jump
    • Right Stick - Aiming
    • Right Trigger - Shoot

The first creation from rookie game developers, Free Food Studios, Purgatorio -Prelude- is the beginning of a long road of games. Join us for our development journey as we continue to learn and work our way up to a full release!
